channel.title: How do I get on my MYSQL connection settings on phpmyadmin?
channel.description:
Hi,
How do I get on the database settings for MYSQL, because I want to set up forums. For it.
Here is a picture of the phpmyadmin homepage:
[img]http://sphinx.ulmb.com/images/mySQL_Er_1108.bmp[/img]
How do I do it?
Thanks

item.title: How do I get on my MYSQL connection settings on phpmyadmin?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Follow the instructions that come with the forum you want to install, which usually includes running an install script.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get on my MYSQL connection settings on phpmyadmin?

item.title: How do I get on my MYSQL connection settings on phpmyadmin?

item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Well, in that case, how do I add a forum to it?

item.title: How do I get on my MYSQL connection settings on phpmyadmin?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

What are you trying to do? You must already have the username and password if you logged in, and the database name is 9286_forum.

Read full topic
